Title: 17 JEWEL SKELETONIZED POCKET WATCH MANUAL WIND
Description: Unsigned 17-Jewel Skeletonized Open Face Pocket Watch China; Man’s; Contemporary CASE: The yellow base metal 46mm plain case features an open face. DIAL: This dial displays Roman numerals and baton hands. MOVT: This 17-jewel stem set movement with lever escapement is gilt and has a bridge style layout. C 2 (Case is in Perfect Condition) M 2 (Movement is in Perfect Condition) Experts Opinion: A real attention getter. If you want to know how a watch works, this timepiece will help you.
